homeTwoHero.title: Hi, I am Gideon Assafuah
homeTwoHero.text:
I am a frontend web developer. I can provide clean code and pixel perfect design.
I also make website more & more interactive with web animations.

homeThreeHero.title: Hi, I am Gideon Assafuah
homeThreeHero.text: I specialize in full-stack development, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. With extensive experience in software engineering and a proven track record of optimizing performance and enhancing user engagement, I'm passionate about leveraging his technical skills to drive innovation in dynamic environments.

aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Gideon Assafuah
aboutData.subtitle: Software Engineer
aboutData.text: I am a Visual Designer with a strong focus on digital branding. Visul design seeks to attract, inspire, create desires and otivate people to respond to messages, with a view to making a favorable impact.

services.title: Software Engineering and Development
services.text: Comprehensive software development from requirement analysis to maintenance, including performance and scalability optimization.

services.title: Database Design and Management
services.text: Design and implementation of efficient database schemas using MySQL and MongoDB.Database optimization and migration services.

services.title: Machine Learning and AI Solutions
services.text: Creating predictive models with Python and Scikit-learn, and implementing machine learning solutions for data analysis.

services.title: DevOps and Cloud Integration
services.text: Deployment and management of applications on cloud platforms like AWS. Implementation of CI/CD pipelines using Docker and Kubernetes.

services.title: Technical Consulting and Training
services.text: Offering expert advice on technology stack, project planning, and best practices, plus workshops on programming and development tools.

skillData.title: All the skills that I have in that field of work are mentioned.
skillData.text: I possess a diverse and robust set of technical skills, honed through rigorous academic training and extensive professional experience. My expertise spans various programming languages, development frameworks, and tools, enabling me to build efficient, scalable, and high-quality software solutions. experience.title: Graduate Assistant
experience.subTitle: Norfolk State Univeristy
roles: Conducting research in the field of machine learning and artificial intelligence.
Developing and implementing algorithms for data analysis and predictive modeling.
Organized and managed a series of student events and workshops, resulting in a 40% increase in student engagement.
Assisted faculty members with research project and data analysis
Provided individualized support and guidance to students seeking assistance with C++ programming assignments and projects.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.subTitle: ERPGap PromtEQUATION
roles: Designed, implemented, and maintained software solutions in collaboration with a dedicated team, ensuring alignment with client requirements and project goals.
Optimized application performance by 25% through advanced caching strategies and efficient code optimization.
Partnered with QA engineers to identify, troubleshoot, and resolve software defects, reducing post-release issues by 30%.
Developed front-end components using React.js and Vue.js and built scalable back-end applications with Node.js.
Employed best practices in software development, including version control (Git), continuous integration/deployment (CI/CD), and containerization with Docker.
Conducted code reviews to ensure quality and consistency, and facilitated agile development processes, enhancing team productivity and project outcomes.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.subTitle: Walulel, Ghana
roles: Developed and maintained robust web applications using React.js and Node.js, optimizing performance and ensuring high responsiveness.
Designed and implemented efficient database schemas with SQL and MongoDB, improving data retrieval and storage processes.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, plan projects, and deliver high-quality software solutions.
Conducted thorough testing and debugging, significantly reducing system errors and enhancing user experience.
Applied best practices in software development, including code reviews, version control (Git), and continuous integration/deployment (CI/CD).
Enhanced application performance through code optimization and caching strategies.
Participated in agile methodologies, contributing to sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives, improving team productivity.
Mentored junior developers, fostering a collaborative and knowledge-sharing environment.

Norfolk State University
Norfolk, VA, USA
education.text: Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Full-Stack Development, Data Structures and Algorithms, Database Management Systems, Web Development, Software Engineering, Computer Security, Computer Organization and Architecture.

education.text: Data Structures and Algorithms, Digital Logic Design, Operating Systems, Microprocessors and Microcontrollers, Software Engineering, VLSI Design, Electronics and Circuit Theory.
